mn135:5.1: The phrase “some woman or man” is used only here and in a few suttas that also deal with kamma ([an3.70](), [an8.42](), [an8.43](), [an8.45]()).
mn135:10.4: Note that text switches from vannavanta in preface to pasadika here.
mn135:21.4: He went for refuge first in [mn99:28.4]() and subsequently in [dn10:2.37.9]().
